Original: 我和男友逛完士林夜市後來到這裡。我們受到了主人的歡迎，氣氛立刻就感覺很好。那天晚上提供了三款雞尾酒，選自一本老式雞尾酒配方書。這些飲料也盛裝在漂亮的老式玻璃器皿中。雞尾酒調製得很好，燈光很好，音樂（黑膠唱片！）很令人愉快，工作人員很友好，樂於助人。我們待了2個多小時。後來，店主好心地給了我們一個直擊以表謝意。總的來說，這是一次非常好的體驗，絕對是我們台北之旅的眾多亮點之一。
EN: My boyfriend and I came here after visiting Shilin Night Market.We were welcomed by the owner, and the atmosphere immediately felt good.Three cocktails were provided that night, which was selected from an old -fashioned cocktail formula.These beverages are also presented in beautiful old -fashioned glassware.The cocktail is very good, the light is very good, the music (vinyl record!) It is pleasant, the staff is very friendly and helpful.We stayed for more than 2 hours.Later, the shopkeeper gave us a direct hit to express her gratitude.In general, this is a very good experience, and it is definitely one of the many highlights of our Taipei trip.
